name: httpdwatch - apache's log file parser
short_description: A parser that matches httpd access/error logs entries, recognizes spoiled accesses and split entries by date filter and good/bad accesses. Also feeds red and black lists to deny access. In/out paths and file names and spoiled URI can be configured.
